title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.9 - U turns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.9 - U turns

State Regulations

No U turns shall be made on any part of the vehicular
crossing except under the direction of a bridge employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
